EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-3378 MSF Username Changed Including Remember Me
EmailTemplate.name: MSF Username Changed Including Remember Me
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Your Data Explorers Username has changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please note that your username for logging into IHS Markit's Securities Finance products has now changed.
Your username is: (enter username here);
IMPORTANT NOTE: The username is case sensitive and your password has not been changed on this occasion. All usernames and passwords are case sensitive.
Please click on the following links to access:
- DX Open - Risk Explorer - SF One
If you have previously ticked the 'Remember Me' box when logging in to any Securities Finance Web application, you may need to clear cache and delete cookies in your web browser.
If you are unable to clear your cache and cookies please contact your internal IT team. Once you have done this you can login using the above username.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
